creator: jian.cai@sun.com
text:
When tomcat tries to use data resource to connect to the database, it hangs 
there and no response is given. Both pointbase and Mysql have been tested. This 
problem happened several months ago.

The following is the config:

    <ResourceParams name="jdbc/WorkflowAppDb">
      <parameter>
        <name>validationQuery</name>
        <value></value>
      </parameter>
      <parameter>
        <name>username</name>
        <value>root</value>
      </parameter>
      <parameter>
        <name>maxWait</name>
        <value>5000</value>
      </parameter>
      <parameter>
        <name>maxActive</name>
        <value>4</value>
      </parameter>
      <parameter>
        <name>password</name>
        <value>wsi</value>
      </parameter>
      <parameter>
        <name>url</name>
        <value>jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/workflow</value>
      </parameter>
      <parameter>
        <name>driverClassName</name>
        <value>com.mysql.jdbc.Driver</value>
      </parameter>
      <parameter>
        <name>maxIdle</name>
        <value>2</value>
      </parameter>
    </ResourceParams>

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I disagree with the bug report (as I did months ago). It works with correctly
setup databases (ex: hsql), and if it does not work, it is a problem with DBCP
or the JDBC driver.
